mapper.select: SELECT f.film_id, f.original_title, to_char(f.release_date, 'yyyy'), f.plot, f.poster_path, f.backdrop_path, NVL(r.avgRate, 0), NVL(r.width, 0) FROM fm_film f LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT film_id, ROUND( AVG(rate), 2 ) AS avgRate, ROUND( AVG(rate), 2 )*20 AS width FROM fm_review GROUP BY film_id) r ON f.film_id=r.film_id WHERE f.film_id=#{filmId}
SELECT fp.people_id, fp.credit_order, p.enname FROM fm_film_people fp INNER JOIN fm_people p ON fp.people_id = p.people_id WHERE fp.film_id=#{filmId} ORDER BY fp.credit_order

SELECT /*+ index_desc(fm_review_pk) */ r.rno, r.writer, r.rate, r.rate*20 AS width, r.content, r.is_spoiled, r.insert_ts, r.update_ts, r.like_cnt, r.comment_cnt, u.nickname, u.profile_photo_path FROM fm_review r INNER JOIN fm_user u ON r.writer = u.user_id WHERE film_id=#{filmId} AND r.delete_ts is null ORDER BY r.like_cnt OFFSET ( #{currPage} - 1) * #{amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
SELECT count(rno) FROM fm_review r INNER JOIN fm_film f ON r.film_id=f.film_id WHERE r.film_id=#{filmId} AND rno > 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fm_review(film_id, writer, rate, content, is_spoiled) VALUES (#{filmId}, #{writer}, #{rating}, #{content}, #{isSpoiled})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN code=1 THEN 1 END), COUNT(CASE WHEN code=2 THEN 1 END), COUNT(CASE WHEN code=3 THEN 1 END) FROM fm_film_reaction WHERE film_id = #{filmId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fm_film_reaction(user_id, film_id, code) VALUES (#{userId}, #{filmId}, #{code})
